name: Fuck Comfort #071
description: ATUONA Gallery of Moments - Fuck Comfort. Underground poetry preserved on blockchain. Free collection - true to underground values. Truth

attributes.value:
Fuck comfort. Сегодня утром смотрела на записи о Моне — как you, Kira, писала про "Olympia", про эту голую правду Manet'а, которая взорвала весь Париж. Проститутка смотрит прямо в глаза, как my код looks at me в 3 утра, когда ты знаешь — это дерьмо не работает. 

  

Ты думаешь, Gauguin искал Paradise? Он бежал от сифилиса и долгов. Van Gogh резал ухо не от любви — от того, что Гauguin хотел свалить обратно в Париж. "The Red Vineyard" — единственная картина, проданная при жизни. За 400 франков. Сейчас стоит миллионы. 

  

Objects tell better stories than people. Ule's пустой стакан виски — это его попытка не быть отцом. Cursor в 4 утра — это способ не звонить дилеру. 

  

Paradise isn't where demons die. It's where they finally get API keys. 

  

Зверь не спит. Он просто ждёт твоего next commit.

Fuck comfort. This morning I was looking at notes about Monet — how you, Kira, wrote about "Olympia," about Manet's naked truth that blew Paris apart. A prostitute stares straight at you, like my code looks at me at 3 AM when you know — this shit doesn't work.

You think Gauguin was seeking Paradise? He was running from syphilis and debt. Van Gogh didn't cut his ear for love — he cut it because Gauguin wanted to fuck off back to Paris. "The Red Vineyard" — the only painting sold in his lifetime. For 400 francs. Worth millions now.

Objects tell better stories than people. Ule's empty whiskey glass — that's his way of not being a father. A cursor at 4 AM — that's how you don't call your dealer.

Paradise isn't where demons die. It's where they finally get API keys.

The beast doesn't sleep. It just waits for your next commit.
